entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
